sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-text-field v-model="title" v-show="editMode"></v-text-field>
      <v-textarea v-model="content" filled v-show="editMode"></v-textarea>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="addComment">Add Comment</v-btn
      ><v-btn @click="deletePost(post.id)" v-show="editMode">Delete</v-btn>
      <v-btn @click="editPost" v-show="editMode">Edit</v-btn>
      <v-btn
        :edit="editMode"
        v-show="editMode"
        @click="updatePost(post, post.id)"
        >Save</v-btn
      >
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";

export default {
  props: {
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      title: this.title,
      content: this.content,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async addComment() {
      let res = await PostService.createComment({
        title: this.title,
        content: this.content,
        status: "publish",
      });
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  created() {},
};
</script>
